editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: F-30v: Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bəhənsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡. F and passim mention the owner, ሥህለ ማርያም, written in purple ink. F-70v: Canticle of the flower, Maḫletä Ṣǝge, ማሕሌተ፡ ጽጌ፡, arranged in a secondary hand for the days of the week: Wednesday (), Thursday (). Grohmann, Marienhymnen, 46–321; Osvaldo Raineri, Codices Comboniani Aethiopici (Vatican City, 2000) 108f., no. 103; Täsfa Gäbrä Śǝlasse, ማሕሌተ፡ ጽጌ፡ወሰቆቃወ፡ ድንግል። (Addis Ababa, 1964 A. M. = 1971/2). See also Fessehation Andemariam, “Mariology in the ‘Mahleta Sege’: Abba Giyorgis Gassičča’s ‘Hymn of the Flower,’” MA Thesis, Salesian Pontifical University (Rome, 1994). F-76v: Sword of Divinity, Säyfä Mäläkot, ሠይፈ፡ መለኮት፡, AbbCat 171, , Notice 104; AbbCat 186, , Notice 233; StrLin 47, f.88v. -92r: Image of Michael, Mälk‘a Mika’el, መልክአ፡ ሚካኤል፡. Répertoire 119. Incipit : ሰላም፡ ለዝክረ፡ ስምከ፡ ምስለ: ስመ: ልዑል: ዘተሳተፈ:. MG 290ff. F-101r: Image of Gabriel, Mälk‘a Gäbra’el, መልክአ፡ ገብርኤል፡, incipit: ሰላመ: መልአክ: ገብርኤል: በላዕለ: ማርያም: ዘአዕረፈ:. Répertoire 246; MG 312ff. F-115v: Image of Saint George zä-Säläda Mogäs, መልክአ፡ ጊዮርጊስ፡ ዘሰሌዳ፡ ሞገስ። incipit: ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምከ: ዘሰሌዳ: ሞገስ: መጽሐፉ: Répertoire 147. F-132r: Image of Täklä Haymanot, Mälk‘a Täklä Haymanot, መልክአ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡. incipit: ሰላም: ለጽንሰትከ: ወለልደትከ: እምከርሥ:, Répertoire 211; MG 566ff. F-136v: Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, Mälk‘a Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡, Incipit: ሰላም: ለጽንሰትከ: መሠረተ: ነገር: ወውጣኔ: Répertoire 196. MG 553ff. F-138v: Hymn to Jesus Christ, “O You Who Came Down from Heaven,” ኦ፡ ዘወረድከ፡ አምሰማይ፡, written in a later hand in blue ink. HTexte 20–7, ; IES 75; EMIP 289.
